column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=A couple of nights ago I felt really sick , and one of the things that usually helps me feel better is to take a hot bath .
#text=So I went into my bathroom and prepared the bath tub .
#text=First I plugged the drain so the water would n't escape .
#text=Then I turned on the hot water and let it fill up .
#text=I then tested the water to see how hot it was , because I did n't want to jump right in and burn myself .
#text=I decided it was a little too hot , so I let it cool for a couple of minutes .
#text=Once the water was a comfortable temperature I stepped in and laid down in the water .
#text=I let the warm water sooth my aches and pains and I began to feel better .
#text=I had n't taken a shower that day , so I decided I should also clean myself while I was in the bath .
#text=Once that was over I unplugged the drain and dried myself off .
